1.content: One day, you were walking down the street in your town. You trip over something, and fall to the ground. Wincing in pain, you look to see what you tripped on. It was none other than a purse. What kind of purse was it?
1.title: Your adventures begin...

choices: Before Max could think,A Female Cop Grabs Him
Max Picks It Up to try and look for the Owner
The Purse begins to Glow and Move And Talk
A Traveling Purse Saleswoman Grabs it,claiming it’s there’s
Max just leaves the purse on the sidewalk,thinking touching it is wrong
11.content:
Your Name Was Max Stephen, you were A 25 year old Man,pale skin,Nice Guy,with a few secret kinky fetish’s,One day, you were walking down the street in your town. You trip over something, and fall to the ground. Wincing in pain, you look to see what you tripped on. It was none other than a decretive white purse
Who would leave a Purse on the street Said Max intrigued
Max was thinking long and hard to find the right thing to do with the purse...
11.title: Story 1:   A decretive white purse

info.brief_description: You find a purse on the street as man that will transform you once you pick it up.
info.description:
You start out as a male human of any age. You find a purse that someone drops. The last owner who had it is what you become.

Rules:
1.) Sex is okay.
2.) No ending the story, no short chapters, and no one-choice chapters.
3.) I will award Gift Points for very well written chapters.
4.) Please use proper spelling and grammar. Be as descriptive as possible.
